tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lab_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    lab_technician VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_results VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES soil_samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE geotechnical_data (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_location VARCHAR(50),
    sample_depth FLOAT,
    sample_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE soil_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    depth_from FLOAT,
    depth_to FLOAT,
    moisture_content FLOAT,
    dry_density FLOAT,
    porosity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE soil_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    property_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_location VARCHAR(50),
    sample_depth FLOAT,
    sample_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE test_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    test_type VARCHAR(20),
    test_value FLOAT,
    test_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE soil_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    soil_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE test_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    method_name VARCHAR(50),
    equipment_required VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    depth FLOAT,
    soil_type TEXT,
    moisture_content FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TestResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    test_date DATE,
    test_type TEXT,
    result_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SampleLocations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Engineers (
    engineer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    specialty TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TestMethods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    description TEXT
)
